title: Top 4 benefits of customized, closed-loop and end-of-life recycling programs for automakers - PR Newswire
summary: The article discusses Novelis' efforts to promote closed-loop and end-of-life recycling programs with automakers to reduce carbon emissions, preserve natural resources, establish secure supply chains, and improve economic benefits through the use of recycled aluminum.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as it focuses on implementing closed-loop recycling programs to reduce carbon emissions, preserve natural resources, and promote a circular economy.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as Novelis is introducing new closed-loop recycling programs to cater to the sustainability needs of the automotive industry, presenting an innovative approach to materials management.
green_product: TRUE. This is a green product innovation as it emphasizes the use of recycled aluminum in automotive manufacturing to reduce carbon emissions, conserve resources, and promote sustainability.
green_process: TRUE. This is a green process innovation as the article discusses adopting closed-loop recycling processes in manufacturing to minimize environmental impacts by reducing waste, conserving resources, and promoting sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 331314 - Secondary Smelting and Alloying of Aluminum, 336111 - Automobile Manufacturing, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it focuses on genuine efforts by Novelis to promote sustainable practices and closed-loop recycling programs for the automotive industry.

title: Battle for the Box - Tech Briefs
